content.d: Look, look, Ayumu! There’s frost on the ground!
It’s so fun to step on it and hear it crunch~
Hehe, Yu-chan, you say that every year.
Really? You have such a good memory, Ayumu~ ......Huh? Where’s your scarf?
It’s at school. I forgot in the clubroom the other day.
Oh, you can borrow mine then!
...Thank you. It smells like you, Yu...
